name: Mage Math
descr:
[b]***BIG UPDATE IN 2023 - GAME COMPLETELY UPDATED***[/b]

[b]Mage Math is a fantasy math adventure game for kids in grades 1st - 6th. In Mage Math, kids can play a full role-playing video game filled with magic, spells, monsters, and large realms to explore. Children practice math while having fun and building confidence in math.[/b]

[b]SAVE THE MATH REALMS[/b]
Mage Math integrates math with a fantasy adventure video game. Save the math realms by using your magic and math skills!
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1131210/extras/MM2Steam.png?t=1715603639[/img]

[b]MATH IS AN ADVENTURE[/b]
Throughout the realms, kids will practice math to find powerful number stones and get rewards. In math houses, they can answer questions within their grade. Don't worry if they get an answer wrong because they can always go back to the math house to try again.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1131210/extras/SteamGamesMathim.png?t=1715603639[/img]

[b]MATH VIDEOS ARE THERE TO HELP[/b]
Math videos are inside the game to help kids master each math concept. The math videos cover the math that will be tested in the math house. Math videos help kids build confidence in their math skills.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1131210/extras/MathVideos3steam.png?t=1715603639[/img]

[b]USE MAGIC TO SAVE THE MATH REALMS[/b]
You will explore levels, find powerful number stones, fight magical monsters, learn new spells, and save the math realms from a menacing force that has taken hold.
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1131210/extras/SteamGamesMathim3.png?t=1715603639[/img]
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1131210/extras/MMDoublesteam.png?t=1715603639[/img]

[b]OUR GOAL[/b]
We want your kids to gain a greater desire to learn, engage with math, and have fun along the way. Math can be more than fun, it can be an adventure!
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1131210/extras/mainsteamsimage.png?t=1715603639[/img]

Mage Math went through a huge revision as we have added in a whole list of things. Some things that have been updated in 2023 are characters, tutorials, controller support, grade level changes, new monsters, new companions, bigger boss monsters, new spells and more. The game was not visible for a while due to these massive changes so jump on in and let your kids enjoy Mage Math!
